Feature Description : Cameras are mounted in a housing on the
door or A pillar in a similar location to
conventional side mirrors and stream a live
video feed onto displays inside the car for
driver to see and replace the traditional side
mirror.
•
Protected against rain, snow and dirt to
ensure optimum images in all driving
conditions.

Benefits and Competitive solutions:Proposed technology:
The glass covers of this system's camera lens can be design to
heated, so they aren't blocked in bad weather conditions such as
rain or frost.
•
The size is smaller than traditional mirrors, so aerodynamic drag can
be reduced.
•
Provide more wide
angle of the view than traditional mirrors

Functional Needs :
[display] When the driver uses the turn indictors or selects reverse
gear, the E mirror automatically present an extended view of the
area alongside and behind the car, eliminating the blind spot and
helping safer maneuvers.
•
[display]
When the turn, lane change or parking action is
completed, the system automatically returns to its standard
setting.
•
[Setting] The system can be adjusted by one of the touch screen/
interactive control/ traditional button. (
•
[Setting] A menu function gives access to the system’s settings,
including brightness.
•
[Setting] Allow for displaying the warning if system identifies
vehicles in the vehicle’s blind spot.
•
[display]
When parking, the lines indicate distances from the rear
bumper, and along each side of the car.
•
[display]
When highway driving, the driver is helped to judge safe
distances from other traffic with reference lines .
•
[Setting] Automatically adjust the sensitivity and imaging of the
camera.
•
[Setting] Allow user to switch normal/wide angle of the camera
manually or automatically.
